player_news.trend_summary: Manchester United are reportedly in talks to sign Danish star Patrick Dorgu from Lecce, with the 19-year-old defender impressing in Serie A and for his national team. Despite rumors of a Â£34 million transfer, Lecce has reportedly warned United that Dorgu will not be joining them in January, casting doubt on the potential move.

player_news.trend_summary: Emerson Royal, the Brazilian full-back currently playing for AC Milan, has attracted interest from Fulham and Galatasaray, with both clubs reportedly initiating talks with Milan over a potential transfer. player_news.trend_summary: Manchester City has signed 20-year-old Uzbekistan international defender Abdukodir Khusanov from Lens for a reported Â£33.8 million, with the player signing a contract until 2029. Khusanov, who has been capped 11 times by Uzbekistan, is seen as a promising talent and is expected to bolster Manchester City's defensive options.
